mapper.sql: id AS id, spu AS spu, rank_type AS rankType, rank AS rank, create AS create
mapper.insert: insert into tb_product_rank (id, spu, rank_type, rank, create) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rankType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{create,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
